properties.name: April 16: Gang member gunned down
properties.description: Posted by Calgaryherald72 Saddlecrest. Blvd. N.E. CalgarySon Thahn Nguyen, 26, shot as he was parking in his Saddlecrest Blvd. garage. Nguyen was a high-ranking gang member. Suspects sped off in a car. The day prior, one of Nguyen’s associates was shot in the hand outside Plush nightclub. Unsolved.

properties.name: April 22: Fight in old folk's home ends in death
properties.description: Posted by Calgaryherald900 block of 18A Street N.W. CalgaryJohn Driscoll, 81, charged with second-degree murder after his 77-year-old roommate, James Cairns, at Bethany Care Centre at 900 block of 18A Street N.W.

properties.name: Feb. 25: Senior dead, now considered homicide
properties.description: Posted by CalgaryheraldMike MacGregor\'s death, from unreleased causes, is now considered a homicide by police. The senior was found dead after his son phoned 911 and said he\'d found his dad injured in his home.

properties.name: Feb. 26: Mom charged with daughter's murder
properties.description: Posted by Calgaryherald31 Fay Rd. S.E. Calgary Aset Magomadova charged with second-degree murder in the strangulation death of her 14-year-old daughter Aminat during a fight in their Fairview home

properties.name: Feb. 28: Girlfriend murdered in Citadel
properties.description: Posted by Calgaryherald 780 Citadel Drive N.W. Calgary, AlbertaStephanie Novak, 18, found dead at 780 Citadel Drive N.W. Former boyfriend Yuong Minh Vu, 27, charged with second-degree murder.

properties.name: Feb. 3: Shot through window
properties.description: Posted by CalgaryheraldTempleby Crescent N.E. Calgary, AlbertaFeb. 3: Adam Cavanagh, 18, fatally shot through the basement window of his family\'s northeast Templeby Crescent home about 2 a.m. Unsolved.

properties.name: Jan. 24: Murder, delayed suicide
properties.description: Posted by Calgaryherald120 Sierra Morena Landing S.W. Calgary, AlbertaJan. 24: Police responding to a 911 domestic call find Gizelle McMullen, 48, dead inside her home at 120 Sierra Morena Landing S.W. Her husband Robert Charles McMullen, 52, is taken to hospital with “injuries.” He leaves the hospital without being discharged and two days later is found dead by a friend inside a northeast automotive garage.

properties.name: Jan. 4: Body found in burning dumpster.
properties.description: Posted by Calgaryherald2400 7 Street N.E. CalgaryBurning Dumpster On Jan. 4, the body of Yonas Amahazion, 19, was found burning in a dumpster. He was identified through dental records. The case is unsolved.

properties.name: Mar. 3: Elderly mom murdered, adult son charged
properties.description: Posted by CalgaryheraldMargaret Hetrick found dead inside her home at Hawkdale Gate NW. Son Gregory John Hetrick, 51, charged with second degree murder.

properties.name: Mar. 9: Drug deal gone wrong leaves two dead downtown
properties.description: Posted by CalgaryheraldChristian Blake Blondeau, 35, died of a single stab wound after an attack under the Langevin Bridge. Also dead is Alfons Daniel Kunz, 57, who was stabbed several times. Both are known drug dealers around the Drop-In Centre. Unsolved.
